content: पुरस्कृ {c8c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To place before or in front, make one's leader, put at the head; हते जरति गांगेये पुरस्कृत्य शिखंडिनं <ls>Ve. 2. 4</ls>; <ls>U. 1. 3</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 52.</ls> {@--2@} To introduce, present; मद्वचनात्स राजा शकुंतलां पुरस्कृत्य वक्तव्यः <ls>Ś. 4</ls>, <ls n="Ś.">7</ls> {@--3@} To honor, respect, esteem, hospitably receive or entertain; दर्शनेनैव भवतीनां पुरस्कृतोऽस्मि <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To adopt, choose, follow; स पुरस्कृतमध्यमक्रमः <ls>R. 8. 9.</ls> {@--5@} To appoint. {@--6@} To show, indicate, evince, {@--7@} To lead. {@--8@} To use as a pretext.
